tip: You can change the frequency of tips by adding a json object instead of a string, like so. For example, this tip has a frequency of 0 and will never show up. The default freq value is 1.

[UNKNOWN] *INTERRUPTION*..The Hegemony will pay..*STATIC*...so many brothers and sisters...*STATIC*...with our last contract...*STATIC*...arriving in this sector...*STATIC*...They've become too strong...*STATIC*...expand and destroy the Hegemony!...*STATIC*
